channel.title: type-safe on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in type-safe on Fresh Swift

item.title: The power of Result types in Swift
item.description: John Sundell looks at the Result type, a commonly used type in many swift projects which will likely some day be part of the Swift standard library. John provides code examples of how this type can be best utilized to reduce ambiguity.

item.title: Swift Tip: Type-Safe Initialization using Storyboards
item.description: In this short post, one in a series of weekly Swift Tips, the Objc.io team demonstrate a simple way to make working with iOS storyboards safer and more robust.

item.title: Type-safe identifiers in Swift
item.description: John Sundell demonstrates how using type-safe identifiers can be an excellent way to make our code more robust and less error prone.
